void NutTraceTcp ( FILE *  stream,
uint8_t  flags 
)

Control TCP tracing.

Parameters:
stream Pointer to a previously opened stream or null to leave it unchanged.
flags Flags to enable specific traces.
Examples:
httpd/httpserv.c, and tcps/tcps.c.
